data.name: Pulsar Crash
data.detailed_description:
Pulsar Crash fuses the white-knuckle gameplay of 2D twin-stick shooters with the competitive spirit of fighting games.

Pulsar Crash is a head to head, competitive twin stick shooter in which up to 4 players pilot starships with unique abilities in top-down space battles. The game takes place in a thrilling space-western setting, with an over the top visual style and an electrifying funk/fusion soundtrack.

14+ unique pilots/ships to master!
Each ship has a unique ability designed to cater to a full range of different playstyles.

12+ secondary weapons to choose from!
Carefully select a secondary weapon to pair with your pilot. Collect Pulsar Orbs during the match to use your secondary weapon and unique ship ability!

10 Playable Stages!
Stages are divided into multiple “maps,” with each round taking place on a new map. Each stage is designed around a central easy-to-understand, challenging-to-master mechanic.

Multiple Ways to Play!
Compete in local 2 - 4 player battles, find opponents from around the world in our Discord server to play over Remote Play with Friends, or play through the single player/co-op “Ruckus” (adventure) mode.
